row.process:
:SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "bbsbat" :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "chk_gevos_at_work.sql" :SET &MANDANT# = "" cat << __EOF__ > &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# -- ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- BEREITGESTELLT VON BRODRECHT ALV-IT-SYM -- TEL. : 2920 -- SPUFI : CHK_GEVOS_AT_WORK -- ZWECK :Es wird eine CSV Liste erstellt und an -- den FB verschickt: -- Ueber gesperrte Veträge -- (GeVo, User, Vertragsnummer. Sperrdatum) -- Ausgeschlossen werden: -- GEVO_SKZ = 01 -> Antrag -- GEVO_SKZ = 11 -> COR-Auskunft -- GEVO_SKZ = 56 -> Auskunft -- ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SELECT T1.GEVO_NR , T2.GEVO_SKZ , SUBSTR((T3.LANG_BEZ),1,25) AS LANG_BEZ , T2.BENUTZER_ID , T1.MANDANT , T1.VTR_NR , CASE T2.GEVO_STATUS_SKZ WHEN 1 THEN 'NEUANLAGE' WHEN 2 THEN 'IN_BEARBEITUNG' WHEN 3 THEN 'UNTERBROCHEN' WHEN 4 THEN 'BEENDET' END AS STATUS , TO_CHAR(T2.CREATE_DAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SPERRDATUM FROM TBBGEVO_DURCH_VTR T1 INNER JOIN TBBGEVO_DURCH T2 ON T1.MANDANT = T2.MANDANT AND T1.GEVO_NR = T2.GEVO_NR INNER JOIN TBBSCHL_SMALLINT T3 ON T1.MANDANT = T3.MANDANT AND T2.GEVO_SKZ = T3.SCHL AND T3.STT = 'STT_GEVO' WHERE T1.VTR_FREI_SKZ = 0 AND T2.GEVO_STATUS_SKZ NOT IN (4,3) AND GEVO_SKZ NOT IN (1,11,56) ORDER BY T2.CREATE_DAT DESC ; __EOF__
:INC JOBI.SQL_CSV
exit $rc
